page.title: 03RECREATION
page.content: In the Donemana area there are four playing fields .There are two cricket pitches ,a gaelic pitch and a soccer pitch. One of the cricket pitches is on the Londonderry Road.It is the home of the long established Donemana Cricket Club which presently has an Irish International Player-Junior McBrine.The other Cricket pitch is in Stoneyfalls and is leased from a local farmer by the recently formed Rousky Cricket Club. The Gaelic pitch on the Plumbridge Road is owned by the local St.Patricks Club.The Soccer pitch is on the Strabane Road and is owned by Strabane District Council, which is responsible for recreation in the area.
